title: PM Starmer suggests that the former Prince Andrew should cooperate with US investigation into Epstein
subhead: The former prince, now known as Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor, has so far ignored a request from members of the House Oversight Committee for a 'transcribed interview' about his 'long-standing friendship' with Jeffrey Epstein.

title: Victor Hugo's interior architecture on display in Paris
subhead: The Maison de Victor Hugo on Place des Vosges unveils a lesser-known side of the writer's life with 'Hugo the decorator,' an exhibition that reveals the creativity he poured into designing his own homes.

title: 'I told him about my day in real time': The couples who can't stop texting on WhatsApp
subhead: While couples in France exchange an average of nine text messages a day, some go far beyond, updating their partner in real time about every event in their day-to-day lives. Is this constant connection a sign of profound intimacy, or a need for control?
